item.title: House speaker vote: Mike Johnson on track to fail to get majority on first ballot
item.description: Republicans, who hold a slim majority of seats in the House, twice in the past two years have struggled to reach a consensus on who should be speaker.

item.title: GM, Ford report best annual U.S. sales since 2019
item.description: Both General Motors and Ford Motor on Friday reported their best annual U.S. new vehicle sales since 2019.

item.title: Tesla reports first-ever drop in annual deliveries
item.description: Tesla's fourth-quarter deliveries report follows a huge late-year rally in the stock that lifted its gain for 2024 to 63%.

item.title: Ukraine's halt of Russian gas to Europe throws breakaway Moldovan region into crisis mode
item.description: Moldova's Transnistria region has been thrust into an energy crisis following the termination of a gas transit agreement between Russia and Ukraine.

item.title: JetBlue fined $2 million by DOT for 'chronically delayed flights'
item.description: The Department of Transportation said its $2 million fine against JetBlue was the first of its kind for chronically delayed flights.
